explanation: No additional symbols are required. The MISRA requirement concerns the well‑formedness of for statements; parse_bauth_params contains no for statements (only while loops) and makes no function calls that would become part of a for‑loop body. The provided static call graph shows parse_bauth_params has no callees, so there are no external functions or loop bodies to inspect. (If a macro used in this function—e.g. mhd_assert—could expand into a for loop, its definition would need to be examined; however, as written there is no evidence that any such macro introduces a for statement.)
